_sText:
Just a little map idea i had :) Its a small indoor knife arena, both CT's and T's have 2 doors, the first door opens within 10 seconds and the second (to let u into the arena) opens within 13 seconds.

On the outside of both of the second doors there is a trigger_push, they are team filtered so that the other team cant come and spawnkill and camp in the little waiting bit.

I tried to get the doors to open and close so only 1 person could go in at a time, i think i got pretty close to that, if the doors open to slow or to late please let me know.

When there is 2 people inside the arena, the longer they stay in, the more players will be able to come in and help there team mates :) 

There is 48 spawn points, 24 on each side :)

If you have any problems please let me know.
